AirDodge.NAME: Air Dodge
AirDodge.DESCRIPTION: The next time you would take damage this turn does no damage NL Gain !M! Percent.

AmsahTech.NAME: Amsah Tech
AmsahTech.DESCRIPTION: Gain [E] NL Draw 2 cards NL Exhaust
AmsahTech.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain [E][E] NL Draw 2 cards NL Exhaust

BackAir.NAME: Back Air
BackAir.DESCRIPTION: Aerial NL Finisher NL Deal !D! damage.

BlueFalcon.NAME: Blue Falcon
BlueFalcon.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies NL Apply !M! Percent to ALL enemies.

DIMixUp.NAME: DI Mix Up
DIMixUp.DESCRIPTION: Your next Combo card becomes a Finisher and applies Percent NL Apply !M! Vulnerable to ALL enemies.

DownAir.NAME: Down Air
DownAir.DESCRIPTION: Combo NL Deal !D! damage NL Add additional combo-point. NL Exhaust

DownTilt.NAME: Down Air
DownTilt.DESCRIPTION: Combo Deal !D! damage. Apply !M! Percent to the target.

EdgeCancel.NAME: Edge Cancel
EdgeCancel.DESCRIPTION: Your Aerials cost 1 less [E] this turn. Draw a card. Exhaust.
EdgeCancel.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Your Aerials cost !M! less [E] this turn. Draw a card. Gain [E]. Exhaust.

FalconDive.NAME: Falcon Dive
FalconDive.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. Apply !M! Burn to the target. NL Gain 1 Weak.
FalconDive.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. Apply !M! Burn to the target

FalconKick.NAME: Falcon Kick
FalconKick.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Deal !D! damage. Apply !M! Burn to the target.

FalconPunch.NAME: Falcon Punch
FalconPunch.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Apply !M! Burn to the target. Exhaust.

ForwardSmash.NAME: Forward Smash
ForwardSmash.DESCRIPTION: Finisher NL Deal !D! damage. Apply !M! Burn to the target.

ForwardTilt.NAME: Forward Tilt
ForwardTilt.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Apply !M! Percent to the target.

Gentleman.NAME: Gentleman
Gentleman.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage 2 times, then deal !D! +2 damage.

Grab.NAME: Grab
Grab.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Combo NL Choose a Finisher card from your draw pile and place it into your hand.

HaxDash.NAME: Hax Dash
HaxDash.DESCRIPTION: Gain 1 Dexterity that expires at the end of this turn NL Draw 1 card

Knee.NAME: Knee
Knee.DESCRIPTION: Aerial NL Deal !D! damage NL If the target has 0 combo-points: Combo NL Otherwise: Finisher NL Exhaust

L_Cancel.NAME: Learn to L-Cancel
L_Cancel.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you use an Aerial, reduce the cost of your next card by 1 [E] if it's a non-Aerial

LoseStock.NAME: Lose Stock
LoseStock.DESCRIPTION: Lose 6 health. Gain 1 intangibility NL Gain [E] next turn NL Exhaust
LoseStock.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Lose 6 health. Gain 1 intangibility NL Gain [E][E] next turn NL Exhaust

NeutralAir.NAME: Neutral Air
NeutralAir.DESCRIPTION: Aerial NL Combo Deal !D! damage !M! times

NippleSpike.NAME: Nipple Spike
NippleSpike.DESCRIPTION: Aerial NL Finisher NL Deal !D! damage

PhantomHit.NAME: Phantom Hit
PhantomHit.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! intangibility NL ALL enemies gain 1 intangibility NL Exhaust

PowerShield.NAME: Power Shield
PowerShield.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you gain Block, deal !M! damage to ALL enemies.

RaptorBoost.NAME: Raptor Boost
RaptorBoost.DESCRIPTION: Combo NL Deal !D! damage. Apply !M! Burn NL Gain 1 Vulnerable

Roll.NAME: Roll
Roll.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. Gain !M! Artifact that expires at the end of the turn.

ShieldDrop.NAME: Shield Drop
ShieldDrop.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. Gain !M! Dexterity that expires at the end of this turn

ShieldPoke.NAME: Shield Poke
ShieldPoke.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage that goes through Block

SoftKnee.NAME: Soft Knee
SoftKnee.DESCRIPTION: Aerial NL Combo NL Deal !D! damage

SomebodyClipThat.NAME: Somebody Clip That
SomebodyClipThat.DESCRIPTION: Replay the cards played for this turn NL Exhaust NL Ethereal
SomebodyClipThat.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Replay the cards played for this turn NL Exhaust

Taunt.NAME: Taunt
Taunt.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Vulnerable. Gain 4 Strength. ALL enemies lose 1 Strength.

TeamAttackOn.NAME: Team Attack On
TeamAttackOn.DESCRIPTION: If the target has attacking intent, it attacks another random enemy
TeamAttackOn.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: ALL enemies with attack intent attack another random enemy

UCF.NAME: UCF
UCF.DESCRIPTION: At the start of each turn, add a Shield Drop with Ethereal to your hand.
UCF.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: At the start of each turn, add a Shield Drop with Ethereal to your hand. NL When an enemy dies, add a Phantom Hit to your Draw Pile
